channel.title: A couple of Questions... Quick Please!
channel.description:
Hey guys.. I have a couple of questions that I need urgent help. [b]#1 Runserver[/b] I've looked in every corner of the Internet but I can't find what to put in runserver.bat. I edit it and put what inside?? The tutorial that is sticky in the tutorials sections doesn't help much in this part.. [b]#2 Compiling error[/b] [u]I know your all tired of this error and I KNOW THAT THIS QUESTIONS MUST BE DONE IN "ALL COMPILER/COMPILING RELATED QUESTIONS GO HERE" topic by TeleNubby. But since I'm here, I can ask it and don't spam.[/u] I get this error everytime I try to compile!
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a depracated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint: deprecation for details.
What does this mean?! Has it compiled?! [b]#3 Making the server itself[/b] I need someone that can be able to help me out. I have plenty of questions and I need someone that can help me create my server. I once had one but I mostly forget everything I knew about runescape private servers.. Waiting for replies.

item.title: A couple of Questions... Quick Please!
item.dc:creator: @bower007 bower007
item.description:
@bower007 wrote:

Well… Since I’m a Senior Member… I know I should look in the tutorials before posting a question.

I did that. In my opinion that tut doesn’t help me much…

I will check it again but KEEP POSTING![br][br][size=1]Posted on: 01 June 2009, 00:06:57[/size][hr]Didn’t work!

I checked that tut once more and I didn’t find anything usefull…

I need help people… IDK but I can’t log in. It says Error connecting to server…

But I have the runserver.bat opened and running.

It says:

Starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Read full topic

What is going on?!

item.title: A couple of Questions... Quick Please!
item.dc:creator: @bower007 bower007
item.description:
@bower007 wrote:

Hey guys…

I have a couple of questions that I need urgent help.

#1 Runserver

I’ve looked in every corner of the Internet but I can’t find what to put in runserver.bat. I edit it and put what inside??

The tutorial that is sticky in the tutorials sections doesn’t help much in this part…

#2 Compiling error

I know your all tired of this error and I KNOW THAT THIS QUESTIONS MUST BE DONE IN “ALL COMPILER/COMPILING RELATED QUESTIONS GO HERE” topic by TeleNubby. But since I’m here, I can ask it and don’t spam.

I get this error everytime I try to compile!

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a depracated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint: deprecation for details.

What does this mean?! Has it compiled?!

#3 Making the server itself

I need someone that can be able to help me out. I have plenty of questions and I need someone that can help me create my server.

I once had one but I mostly forget everything I knew about runescape private servers…

Waiting for replies.
